content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 3, Shakhtar Donetsk 2.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 3, Shakhtar Donetsk 2.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Shakhtar Donetsk 2. Victor Moses (Chelsea) header from very close range to the top right corner. Assisted by Juan Mata with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Razvan Rat.
Ramires (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Shakhtar Donetsk).
